name: farm-at-home
description: Sample page of a supermarket using all JS frameworks

scripts.react: cd node_modules/farm-at-home-react/ & npm run frontend & cd .. & cd ..
scripts.angular: cd node_modules/farm-at-home-angular/ & npm run frontend & cd .. & cd ..
scripts.angularjs: cd node_modules/farm-at-home-angularjs/ & npm run frontend & cd .. & cd ..
scripts.vuejs: cd node_modules/farm-at-home-vuejs/ & npm run frontend & cd .. & cd ..
scripts.start: npm run backend | npm run react | npm run angular | npm run angularjs | npm run vuejs
